name: A Quick Flame
description:
Navigate a semi-open world environment, utilizing flame apples to melt obstacles. Explore then environment to reveal story elements. And most of all, take your time to enjoy the scenery!

Made in ~10 days for Vimjam 3: Multi-Use. Inspired by A Short Hike and The First Tree.

Controls
  • The controls are revealed as you play. Both Keyboard and Gamepad are supported (use the options menu to swap to Gamepad button prompts).
  • F will toggle full screen and windowed mode (locked at 720p in windowed)
